name: Mosaic Pictures!
description:
The MOSAIC PICTURES is another creative game developing of Bead with new figures and colors. The game can help to develop the player's talents and good amusement for everyone.

- 4 color sets
- 30 colored mosaic pieces
- 12 tables
- unlimited combination
- you can save and load your creations
- you can save to Photo Album
- post your picture on your facebook wall
